body:
Hey!
So, I came up with an idea, lets see what you think!

So, As you might already know, Avicus Tournament is around the corner, and I was thinking about the winners, and I came up with this!:

- A Tournament Winner rank, In game and forums.
- A ''Decanus" rank with these privileges:

~ Choosing team on ALL minigames
~  A Pex in game
~ A /nick command
~ Pets n' trails

That's It!

title: [Sug] Tournament winner's

replies.body: We won't be copying OCN with their ranks.
replies.body_tagged: We won't be copying OCN with their ranks.

replies.body: That's why I said "Decanus" because these name can vary. The importance is the privileges
